Shopify Testimonials Grid Section

Learn how to create a Testimonials Grid section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The Testimonials Grid section is a customizable grid layout for displaying client testimonials on your Shopify store. This grid features responsive design elements to ensure it looks fantastic on all screen sizes. Each testimonial within this section can include an image, a quote, and a citation, giving a personal touch to the testimonials you showcase.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "Testimonials Grid"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  1. Customer Feedback Display: Use the Testimonials Grid section to showcase satisfied customers' feedback on your homepage, product pages, or dedicated testimonial pages. This adds social proof and boosts customer trust.

  2. Influencer Testimonials: Highlight testimonials from influencers or well-known figures who have used and endorsed your products. This can significantly increase your brand's credibility and customer engagement.

  3. Service Reviews: If you offer services in addition to products, you can use this section to display reviews and quotes from clients who have experienced your services, helping to convert potential customers.

  4. Event Feedback: If your store frequently hosts events or webinars, you can showcase testimonials from attendees, giving future participants a glimpse of what to expect.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

  1. Text Settings:

    • Text Font: Choose the font for the quote text from a variety of font options.
    • Text Size: Adjust the font size for the quote text (10 - 50px).
    • Citation Font: Choose the font for the citation text.
    • Cite Size: Adjust the font size for the citation text (10 - 50px).

  2. Color Settings:

    • Background Color: Set the background color of the testimonials grid section. This can include gradients or solid colors.
    • Text Color: Customize the color of the text within the testimonials.
    • Highlight Color: Set the color for highlight elements such as icons or borders.

  3. Dimension Settings:

    • Max Width of Section: Set the maximum width of the testimonials grid.
    • Padding:
      • Padding Top: Amount of space above the grid.
      • Padding Bottom: Amount of space below the grid.
      • Padding Left: Amount of space to the left of the grid.
      • Padding Right: Amount of space to the right of the grid.
    • Spacing Between Elements: Control the amount of space between elements in the grid.

  4. Testimonial Blocks:

    • Testimonial Image: Upload an image associated with the testimonial.
    • Quote: Provide the testimonial quote text.
    • Cite: Specify the citation text, such as the name of the person giving the testimonial.
    • Call to Action Link: Add a URL linking to more information or a product page.

By personalizing these settings, you can craft a testimonials section that perfectly aligns with your store's aesthetics and brand voice.
